platformServiceFee_id, platformServiceFee.PlatformId platformServiceFee_platformId, platformServiceFee.SpvId platformServiceFee_spvId, platformServiceFee.ProductId platformServiceFee_productId, platformServiceFee.ReturnMoneyId platformServiceFee_returnMoneyId, platformServiceFee.SpvLoanId platformServiceFee_spvLoanId, platformServiceFee.TradeNumber platformServiceFee_tradeNumber, platformServiceFee.PayPlantformNumber platformServiceFee_payPlantformNumber, platformServiceFee.PrincipalAmount platformServiceFee_principalAmount, platformServiceFee.ServiceFee platformServiceFee_serviceFee, platformServiceFee.ServiceFeeRatio platformServiceFee_serviceFeeRatio, platformServiceFee.TakeTime platformServiceFee_takeTime, platformServiceFee.TakeStatus platformServiceFee_checkingStatus, platformServiceFee.Remark platformServiceFee_remark from CC_SpvCorporation spvCorporation inner join CC_Member member on member.SpvId=spvCorporation.Id inner join TC_SpvRechargeRecords spvRechargeRecords on spvRechargeRecords.SpvId=spvCorporation.Id inner join TC_SpvWithdrawCashRecords spvWithdrawCashRecords on spvWithdrawCashRecords.SpvId=spvCorporation.Id inner join TC_Subscription subscription on subscription.SpvId=spvCorporation.Id inner join PC_BasicProduct basicProduct on basicProduct.SpvId=spvCorporation.Id inner join TC_ProductReturnMoney productReturnMoney on productReturnMoney.SpvId=spvCorporation.Id inner join TC_SpvProductReturnMoney spvProductReturnMoney on spvProductReturnMoney.SpvId=spvCorporation.Id inner join TC_PlatformServiceFee platformServiceFee on platformServiceFee.SpvId=spvCorporation.Id
and Id=${id} and Type=${type} and Code=#{code} and UmpayAccountNo=#{umpayAccountNo} and AvailableAmount=${availableAmount} and FrozenAmount=${frozenAmount} and UmpayMerchantNo=#{umpayMerchantNo} and Name=#{name} and ShortName=#{shortName} and BankName=#{bankName} and BankCode=#{bankCode} and BankCardNumber=#{bankCardNumber} and SignaturePicPath=#{signaturePicPath} and Phone=#{phone} and Fax=#{fax} and PostCode=#{postCode} and Address=#{address} and Description=#{description} and Status=${status} and CreateTime=#{createTime} and ModifyTime=#{modifyTime}

select Id spvCorporation_id, Type spvCorporation_type, Code spvCorporation_code, UmpayAccountNo spvCorporation_umpayAccountNo, AvailableAmount spvCorporation_availableAmount, FrozenAmount spvCorporation_frozenAmount, UmpayMerchantNo spvCorporation_umpayMerchantNo, Name spvCorporation_name, ShortName spvCorporation_shortName, BankName spvCorporation_bankName, BankCode spvCorporation_bankCode, BankCardNumber spvCorporation_bankCardNumber, SignaturePicPath spvCorporation_signaturePicPath, Phone spvCorporation_phone, Fax spvCorporation_fax, PostCode spvCorporation_postCode, Address spvCorporation_address, Description spvCorporation_description, Status spvCorporation_status, CreateTime spvCorporation_createTime, ModifyTime spvCorporation_modifyTime from CC_SpvCorporation where Id=${id}

select Id spvCorporation_id, Type spvCorporation_type, Code spvCorporation_code, UmpayAccountNo spvCorporation_umpayAccountNo, AvailableAmount spvCorporation_availableAmount, FrozenAmount spvCorporation_frozenAmount, UmpayMerchantNo spvCorporation_umpayMerchantNo, Name spvCorporation_name, ShortName spvCorporation_shortName, BankName spvCorporation_bankName, BankCode spvCorporation_bankCode, BankCardNumber spvCorporation_bankCardNumber, SignaturePicPath spvCorporation_signaturePicPath, Phone spvCorporation_phone, Fax spvCorporation_fax, PostCode spvCorporation_postCode, Address spvCorporation_address, Description spvCorporation_description, Status spvCorporation_status, CreateTime spvCorporation_createTime, ModifyTime spvCorporation_modifyTime from CC_SpvCorporation order by Id asc limit ${start},${offset}
